elements.label: Memento
elements.description: A piece of my past.

elements.label: Contemplation
elements.description: Something that demands rumination, or meditation.

elements.label: Impossible?
elements.description: Edge-Long are defined by - and indeed, sustained by - the opposition they hold against their nemeses. Destroy one half of an Edge dyad, and you destroy both. So how can this be? How can the Iron-Eater still live if his enemy is slain?

elements.label: Debilitation
elements.description: Something has been taken from my flesh and will not return.

elements.label: Ally
elements.description: Someone with whom I share an enemy.

elements.label: Ally, Departing
elements.description: This Ally is preparing to leave the Current Warzone.

elements.label: Aerial Power: Ally
elements.description: What is below cannot escape what is above.

elements.label: Local
elements.description: This one isn't coming with us. [Local Allies will not join you upon leaving the Current Warzone.]

elements.label: Wounded
elements.description: Proof of service. [Wounded Allies cannot be used in the field. If they are not healed in time, they may perish.]

elements.label: Damaged
elements.description: Machinery, like flesh, can fail and die. [Damaged Allies cannot be used in the field. If they are not repaired in time, they may become unsalvageable.]

elements.label: Weakened
elements.description: This one's effectiveness has been blunted.

elements.label: Armor-Piercing
elements.description: Sharp in just the right way. [This will be useful against Enemies who possess the Armoured Aspect.]

elements.label: Force Size
elements.description: How many we are. [Force Size dictates how quickly you and your Allies will move through the Ruined Country. It is also an indicator of how much Space you need to reliably quarter your Allies.]

elements.label: Space
elements.description: There's never enough for everyone. [Space is necessary to quarter your Allies. If Force Size exceeds Space, some of your Allies may be left vulnerable to the elements and other hazards.]

elements.label: Infrastructure
elements.description: Force is nothing without the necessary supports to sustain it.

elements.label: Shrine: Colonel
elements.description:
'The Colonel is a ruthless teacher. His disciplines are the disciplines of iron, of steel, and to learn them is to suffer. The Colonel is also a brilliant teacher. Even the Lionsmith knew and acknowledged this. Who better to teach us the ways of war than the first soldier?'

- #PREVIOUSCHARACTERNAME#, the Exile

elements.label: Shrine: Lionsmith
elements.description: 'The Lionsmith won't hold your hand. If you want to be strong, pick fights with giants; if you want to wrestle lions, jump down into the pit. You'll break in a hundred places, but if you return from that, you'll know strength. If you don't - well, c'est la guerre, I suppose.' - #PREVIOUSCHARACTERNAME#, the Exile

elements.label: Shrine: Wolf-Divided
elements.description:
'The Colonel's got secrets, the Lionsmith's got secrets - pomp and tradition. But the Wolf knows better. Hate's already in the hearts of men; we just tease it out. Make it spill forth. Hate's the truth of the world. If you want to learn anything from the Wolf, learn that.'

- #PREVIOUSCHARACTERNAME#, the Exile

elements.label: Infrastructure, Destroyed
elements.description: The mangled remains of a support system.

elements.label: Enemy
elements.description: There is no war without one. [Enemies will attempt to harm you and your Allies, and may also thwart your efforts to pursue Objectives.

elements.label: Enemy
elements.description: There is no war without one. [Enemies will attempt to harm you and your Allies, and may also thwart your efforts to pursue Objectives.

elements.label: Hidden
elements.description: The strengths and whereabouts of this enemy are yet unknown. [Hidden Enemies can be revealed by scouting your Current Warzone.]

elements.label: Officer's Detail
elements.description: This Enemy has been ordered to guarantee the safety of an important someone. [This Enemy protects another.]

elements.label: Rank: Officer
elements.description: An important someone. [If you kill this Enemy, it will lower the Thresholds of other Enemies at the Current Warzone. However, they cannot be attacked directly until its protectors are slain. Moreover, this Enemy will not attack you directly, nor attempt to impede you when pursuing Objectives.]

elements.label: Armoured
elements.description: Hard to scratch. [This Enemy possesses a high Edge threshold, but if you have Armour-Piercing aspect equal to this Enemy's Armour, you can bypass it.]

elements.label: Aerial Power: Enemy
elements.description: Death from above. [This Enemy possesses a high Edge threshold, but if you have Aerial Power aspect equal to this Enemy's Aerial Power, you can bypass it.]

elements.label: Resilient
elements.description: Difficult to put down. [This Enemy has a chance to survive or escape attacks that would otherwise normally kill it.]

elements.label: Elusive
elements.description: This one is good at covering their tracks. [This Enemy will become Hidden after it initiates an attack against you.]

elements.label: Lethal
elements.description: This one does not leave survivors. [Rather than wound, this Enemy will outright kill any Allies it targets.]

elements.label: Unsubtle
elements.description: Too loud. [This Enemy cannot hide itself.]

elements.label: Braced
elements.description: Prepared for impact. [The first attack made against this Enemy will always fail, but the Enemy will also lose this aspect after it is attacked.]

elements.label: Commander
elements.description: The Enemy will follow this one into battle. [When this Enemy attacks, it can prompt another Enemy on the board to attack alongside it.]

elements.label: Voracious Pack
elements.description: By hunger governed, by hunger strengthened. [This Enemy will die if it attacks you, but when it dies, another like it will feast on its remains and grow stronger.]

elements.label: Hindrance
elements.description: This will not make matters easier. [Hindrances may complicate and delay your efforts to pursue Objectives.]

elements.label: Mundane
elements.description: Of this world.

elements.label: Otherworldly
elements.description: 'Hell aint half full. Hear me. Ye carry war of a madman’s making onto a foreign land. Ye’ll wake more than the dogs.' - Cormac McCarthy, Blood Meridian

elements.label: An Edge Long
elements.description: An immortal of the battlefield; a living dynamo of the Corrivality. It would be suicide for anyone but an Edge Long's ordained nemesis to face them in combat.

elements.label: A Destined Place
elements.description: A great hinge of the Corrivality will turn here. Something impossible may transpire.

elements.label: Warzone
elements.description: A place of contention - I should be there, contending.

elements.label: Current Warzone
elements.description: A place of contention. Here I am, contending.

elements.label: Beyond the Charting of Men
elements.description: This place is kept hidden by certain powers, and reaching it at all is a trial in of itself. [The Edge-Long cannot find you while you are here, but neither can you call Ally reinforcements, reassign Allies you already have, or be resupplied with additional Provisions. If you leave this Warzone, you will never be able to visit it again.]

elements.label: Shaken
elements.description: This one's spirit is cracking.

elements.label: Distant
elements.description: Long is the way and hard, that out of Hell leads up to light. - John Milton, Paradise Lost

elements.label: Abused Locals
elements.description: We are unwelcome. [The locals of the Current Warzone will not accept any help from you, and may even try to sabotage and harm your Allies.]

elements.label: Main Objective
elements.description: A strategic priority. [Enemies and Hindrances will always try to interfere when you pursue a Main Objective, but completing one will raise your Resolution and your esteem amongst the authorities of war - mundane and otherwise.]

elements.label: Main Objective: COMPLETED
elements.description: A strategic priority, seized.

elements.label: Complete
elements.description: A thing brought to its fullest realization.

elements.label: Side Objective
elements.description: We might emerge with something useful if we commit ourselves here. [Side Objectives are not essential, but can often yield rewards that are useful later. Enemies and Hindrances may interfere with your attempts to complete this, but only sometimes.]

elements.label: Threshold: Special?
elements.description: If I wanted to deal with this threat, I would need the assistance of a particular secret or insight.

elements.label: Threshold: Moth
elements.description: If I wanted to deal with this threat using Moth, I would need this much of it - but perhaps there are other strategies to consider.

elements.label: Threshold: Lantern
elements.description: If I wanted to deal with this threat using Lantern, I would need this much of it - but perhaps there are other strategies to consider.

elements.label: Threshold: Forge
elements.description: If I wanted to deal with this threat using Forge, I would need this much of it - but perhaps there are other strategies to consider.

elements.label: Threshold: Edge
elements.description: If I wanted to deal with this threat using Edge, I would need this much of it - but perhaps there are other strategies to consider.

elements.label: Threshold: Winter
elements.description: If I wanted to deal with this threat using Winter, I would need this much of it - but perhaps there are other strategies to consider.

elements.label: Threshold: Heart
elements.description: If I wanted to deal with this threat using Heart, I would need this much of it - but perhaps there are other strategies to consider.

elements.label: Threshold: Grail
elements.description: If I wanted to deal with this threat using Grail, I would need this much of it - but perhaps there are other strategies to consider.

elements.label: Threshold: Knock
elements.description: If I wanted to deal with this threat using Knock, I would need this much of it - but perhaps there are other strategies to consider.

elements.label: Threshold: Forge and Moth
elements.description: If I wanted to deal with this threat using Forge and Moth, I would need this much of both - but perhaps there are other strategies to consider.

elements.label: Threshold: Edge and Lantern
elements.description: If I wanted to deal with this threat using Edge and Lantern, I would need this much of both - but perhaps there are other strategies to consider.

elements.label: Threshold: Edge and Winter
elements.description: If I wanted to deal with this threat using Edge and Winter, I would need this much of both - but perhaps there are other strategies to consider.

elements.label: Threshold: Edge and Forge
elements.description: If I wanted to deal with this threat using Edge and Forge, I would need this much of both - but perhaps there are other strategies to consider.

elements.label: Threshold: Knock and Lantern
elements.description: If I wanted to deal with this threat using Knock and Lantern, I would need this much of both - but perhaps there are other strategies to consider.

elements.label: Threshold: Forge and Heart
elements.description: If I wanted to deal with this threat using Forge and Heart, I would need this much of both - but perhaps there are other strategies to consider.

elements.label: Threshold: Winter and Lantern
elements.description: If I wanted to deal with this threat using Winter and Lantern, I would need this much of both - but perhaps there are other strategies to consider.

elements.label: Threshold: Edge and Knock
elements.description: If I wanted to deal with this threat using Edge and Knock, I would need this much of both - but perhaps there are other strategies to consider.

elements.label: Threshold: Edge and Heart
elements.description: If I wanted to deal with this threat using Edge and Heart, I would need this much of both - but perhaps there are other strategies to consider.

elements.label: Threshold: Edge and Grail
elements.description: If I wanted to deal with this threat using Edge and Grail, I would need this much of both - but perhaps there are other strategies to consider.

elements.label: Threshold: Edge and Moth
elements.description: If I wanted to deal with this threat using Edge and Moth, I would need this much of both - but perhaps there are other strategies to consider.

elements.description: If I wanted to deal with this threat using Winter and Heart, I would need this much of both - but perhaps there are other strategies to consider.

elements.label: Threshold: Lantern and Heart
elements.description: If I wanted to deal with this threat using Lantern and Heart, I would need this much of both - but perhaps there are other strategies to consider.
